Sentencas: Flexible solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have attracted increasing attention due to their excellent mechanical stability and lightness.
Titulo: Highly flexible solid oxide fuel cells using phase-controlled electrolyte support

Sentencas: An essential electrolyte material for developing highly flexible SOFCs is 3 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (3YSZ), but there remain some difficulties in its application to SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly flexible solid oxide fuel cells using phase-controlled electrolyte support

Sentencas: We report a phase-controlled, bendable, ultra-thin 3YSZ electrolyte with a thickness of similar to 22 mu m, high flexural strength, and improved ohmic resistance that surpasses that of 8 mol% YSZ electrolytes.
Titulo: Highly flexible solid oxide fuel cells using phase-controlled electrolyte support

Sentencas: A flexible cell (total thickness < 60 mn) is fabricated through simple and reproducible methods such as tape casting and screen printing.
Titulo: Highly flexible solid oxide fuel cells using phase-controlled electrolyte support

Sentencas: The highest cell performance is achieved among the reported flexible SOFCs, with the maximum power density of 0.86 W cm(-2) at 900 degrees C using conventional cermet electrodes, Ni-YSZ anode, and LSM-YSZ cathode.
Titulo: Highly flexible solid oxide fuel cells using phase-controlled electrolyte support

Sentencas: Our study provides a well-defined framework for developing flexible SOFCs as next-generation power sources for mobile devices with high volumetric power.
Titulo: Highly flexible solid oxide fuel cells using phase-controlled electrolyte support
